post.author: morstua
post.body:
Hi

guys i am trying to make a short movie from a demo

my settings are all at max graphic
for the demo i have com_avidemotics 4 to capture at 60 fps

i tried avidemotics 2 to capture at 30 fps

when i watch the demo, its like in slow motion
rendering is in slow motion
SO
final mp4 is in slow motion


i dont get why..how can i watch and capture my tga with a normal speed?

can anyone help me?
thanx

post.author: morstua
post.body:
i solved

cl_avidemotics "2" = 50 fps

i wrongly thought that every demotic was 15, every demotic is 25 fps

so 4 is 100 and 40 is 1000 (i tried 40... fu**ing awesome!!!!)
